QuestData.Title: Queen-Sized Troubles
QuestData.Description: The spiders keep coming in alarming numbers, $n. You're going to have to go into their lair and kill the broodmother.$B$BWe've spotted the giant spider known as Rygna at the edge of the Blackwald in an area covered in thick webs. It'll be dangerous, but we're all counting on you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Find her in that cave, and come back alive. We're counting on you.
QuestData.RewardText: Great job, $n. We've heard rumors of survivors further in the mountains. Now we'll be able to send scouts there.
